rules_text:
Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control. It can't be blocked by more than one creature this turn.
Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, return Come Out and Play from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text: [i]A never ending spree of death and violence.[/i]
